title: Bolt trap
data:
{{obsolete}}{{flavour|A well-concealed hole containing a crossbow-like contraption with a self-loading mechanism.}}

[[File:Bolt trap.png]]

A '''bolt trap''' is a mechanical [[trap]] which fires a [[bolt]] when stepped upon by a player or [[monster]]. It is the most damaging of the traps that fire damaging ammunition, followed by the [[spear trap]].

Bolt traps can fire 3-11 times before running out of ammo, dealing up to 40 damage to the player, or up to 18 damage to a monster.

[[Repel Missiles#Player sources|Repel Missiles]] reduces the chance of this trap being able to hit the player.

==History==
*Bolt traps, and all mechanical traps, were removed in [[0.27]].
*Prior to [[0.15]], activating a bolt trap would produce usable bolt ammunition.
